Comment: File with custom masks, which could be exported from an existing index or newly generated by "lexicmap utils masks". This flag oversides `-k/--kmer`, `-m/--masks`, `-s/--rand-seed`, etc.
■ Bigger values improve the search specificity and do not increase the index size.
■  Bigger values improve the search sensitivity, increase the index size, and slow down the search speed. For smaller genomes like phages/viruses, m=5,000 is high enough.
